Reviews.Title: i910
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: This product is slow and the touch screen isn't sensitive at all which is something I would like in a touch screen. The media player was good but all in all performance wasn't up to my standards. The screen had a habit of becoming unaligned and I could not realign it. I did however like the camera and the phone's internet capabilities. I would not however recommend this phone to anyone who wants a touch screen phone.

Reviews.Title: The worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: Ronald Tate
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I thought it was the next best thing to a "DROID".  It had features I had never heard of and it was great....until.  The dreaded "freezes", which require a reboot at any- given moment.  Now that still wasn't enough to make me turn my back on this marvel of the electronic age.  As time went on the "freeze" turned to complete screen lock down!  I did buy this phone used so I took it all as a sign of prior use and possible abuse, so I recommended this phone to my wife.  We went for a brand new out of the box i910.  Well, here I am 3 months later writing this review!  From freeze to total screen lock!  Please learn from our mistakes and "DO NOT" buy this phone!  Samsung, you have seen the last of me.

Reviews.Title: Not a happy customer
Reviews.Author: DMM
Reviews.Content: Was not happy with this product,after a few days the phone would not hold charge,had to replace battery,then phone kept getting hot which eventually stopped working.Which was returned and waiting on refund

Reviews.Title: It SUCKED!
Reviews.Author: Jayrife
Reviews.Content: This phone is too small to use without a stylus, and the keyboard switches on you all the time, so you don't know what you are using to type with.. thumbs down.

Reviews.Title: Satisfaction
Reviews.Author: rayjay
Reviews.Content: I would like to say that I am completely satisfied with this product. I enjoy everything about it. It is very easy to operate and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: it's quite small and slow
Reviews.Author: jan
Reviews.Content: The touchpad is pretty small so it's really hard even just to type a number. And when you tap a menu it took a koment to respond. Maybe I'm just a little bit impatientXD

Reviews.Title: ITS A NICE PHONE AND I LIKED THE CAMRA
Reviews.Author: Roger Ruleman
Reviews.Content: i LIKED THE PHONE BUT HAD TO LOAD ALL MY CONTACTS BY HAND WINDOW BASED. I ALSO DID NOT WANT A SMART PHONE. BECAUSE I DON'T USE THE INTERNET. SO I TURN IT OFF. MY FAULT.

Reviews.Title: i have it
Reviews.Author: myeasha
Reviews.Content: i love the phone but it don't work.it won't even come on.and now i have to wait and try to get another phone

Reviews.Title: disappointed 2
Reviews.Author: Tiera
Reviews.Content: This device was not ablenro be used on prepaid but contract only. So another useless purchase for me. Very upset

Reviews.Title: Highly Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Sermonator "manna muncher"
Reviews.Content: The touch screen isn't working and it wasn't worth the price that I paid for it. I wish I would have read other people's reviews before purchasing this item. I am dissatisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: dont buy these broken products
Reviews.Author: keshown briscoe
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your time with  these cell phones I waited 2weeks for the phone to came when I was told 3-5 bussiness days then when I received the phone it was so raggaly I know I purchased a use phone it look like trash the phone did not come on even after I  charged it for about 24  hours one thing I can say I did get a full refund with no problem .

Reviews.Title: Omnia I910 (Verzion) phone
Reviews.Author: La'Shay Myles
Reviews.Content: I want to return the phone. I am very disappointed with the phone and I dont like it. As an description on here it stated the phone was prepaid. When I took the phone to the store to activate it the receptionist I was talking to told me its a contract phone and not prepaid. I was highly upset and disappointed. Not ordering anymore phones off of Amazon.

Reviews.Title: outdated phone
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: This phone was outdated and unusable with todays phone technology.  It would not work with my current phone/ data service.

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: tammy
Reviews.Content: its a stylish cell phone touch screen works great..nice on the eyes big screen love my new cell phone :)

Reviews.Title: Dissappointment
Reviews.Author: Raiven
Reviews.Content: The phone seemed like a good Idea online. I bought it for my sister. It arrived on time in fact before the estimated date however, when it arrived I had to clear someones contacts/pictures and Emails because the hard reset would not do it, then my sister used if for two days before it started freezing up and but the end of the week it would not charge.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was looking for :(
Reviews.Author: Skip87
Reviews.Content: My son wanted a touch screen smart phone. However, this phone was very slow and dated. I will keep searching

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Tim Sorter
Reviews.Content: it was to high tect for me  I needed a much simpler phone  so a slide phone works best for me

Reviews.Title: ominia i910
Reviews.Author: garth
Reviews.Content: i have my fingers to big for good operation but a nice phonefor someone evrything works looks great good shippiing

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Wendy Grosjean
Reviews.Content: It would be better  if it had directions with it but I  really like the arrow on the side. Real nice

Reviews.Title: unhappy customer
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Thurman
Reviews.Content: this phone made no sense....i was unable to have it connected ..it truely was a mistake buying it and i thought i was buying a new phone and it wasnt

Reviews.Title: barley gets service
Reviews.Author: jason miller
Reviews.Content: The thing barley gets service no matter where i go or am at the internet connection barley works my LG phone works ten times better

Reviews.Title: some phone
Reviews.Author: Mary Davis
Reviews.Content: The phone operates as it is suppose to, but the back cover has never stayed on.  It constantly comes off  due to the fact that the small plastic part is broken to ensure the back snaps on.  This is definitely not one of verizons user friendly phones.  I had to purchase another phone since it is impossible to have a phone with the back falling off.

Reviews.Title: this product suck.... HATE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Salena Moore
Reviews.Content: After reading all the negative reviews I still bougth ther phone. I wrote the seller countless of times and he did not respone. The phone didnt even cut on. I would not recommend this phone to anyone who needs a phone quick because you will have to send it back as soon as you get it. So you will be out of time and money... PISSED

Reviews.Title: ease of ownership
Reviews.Author: Lauren Jovan
Reviews.Content: i liked this phone because of all the useful programs like excel and powerpoint for business purposes. Also, it has the game bubbles!

Reviews.Title: WORST PHONE EVER !!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Please do not get this phone! This was the worst phone I've ever had in my life! Its soo slow. Its not like other phones at all! You can't even get apps on it. I dont even know why its called a smart phone, it should be called a dumb phone!!!

Reviews.Title: back to the phone is broken
Reviews.Author: osnayafam
Reviews.Content: first off phone worked great!! I love everything abooutt itt!! except for the fact that the bk to the phone is brken. will not evem at all fit on the phone nor stay.. i knew the price of this pphone was to good. i recieved it fast! n i loved the way it was delicately wraped in the package! but the bk uh!!! i bought an otta to go with it, but if i wouldnt have i would not be able to use it at all! unless i taped the back shut!! i just got the phone i dont want to tape it uh!!!!!!!! i just sent an email to the seller i hope the respond soon!!

Reviews.Title: awsom
Reviews.Author: billybob77710
Reviews.Content: this is a awsom phone and got a great deal i am well pleased. thank u billybob77710. have a great day. :)

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: IT_Guy
Reviews.Content: I'm not going spend to much time on this. This phone would have been a good deal if it didn't arrive at my house with the charger literally broken. (good thing i bought a usb cable for it). This phone is extremely sluggish and takes its own time to respond.Being adventurous i decided to upgrade the OS from the 6.1 it came with to the official 6.5. (i'm no stranger to these types of stuff) i was taken back when the phone refused to boot up, so i though ok, hard reset will fix this but to my surprise none of the reset methods work.On a positive not the camera is pretty good.If ur not looking for a decent camera for this price DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE.

Reviews.Title: VERY ANGRY
Reviews.Author: The Candle Lady
Reviews.Content: Will not buy from these people ever  again. They sold be a defective phone that can not be activated. Basically lost out on our money and is nothing but a cheap piece of plastic.

Reviews.Title: not complete
Reviews.Author: Difficult sale
Reviews.Content: I received the phone in excelllent time but didn't get all of product. Its not the first time I had to deal with this

Reviews.Title: No operation manual!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Eugene Porter
Reviews.Content: Without an operation manual we could not operate the phone.  We went to 4 different people before we could operate the phone.

Reviews.Title: It was both the seller and the phone
Reviews.Author: ed Eick
Reviews.Content: First of all you buy a new phone you get paperwork in the box warranty info, users guide. whatever else they may thrown in this one had nothing so to just pick it up and use it GGRRRRR......IMPOSSIBLE!!!!!! The only good thing was the return was very simple!

Reviews.Title: Not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Babs "Moose"
Reviews.Content: First of all, the phone never worked since the day I received it. I had to send it back. Will not recommend this to no one.

Reviews.Title: WTF????
Reviews.Author: Pissed Off Parent
Reviews.Content: I just got this P.O.S. yesterday and this s*** has not even turned on since I've had it. How in the hell do you send someone crap like this and take customer's money knowing that this sorry ass phone doesn't work right out of the box?!?!?!?! I'm reading all of the other reviews and I see that this problem has history behind it. Step ya damn game up and get some quality s*** shipped to the customers that are going to still deal with this because I'm done with it.

Reviews.Title: BY FAR THE WORST PHONE EVER!!!
Reviews.Author: jade
Reviews.Content: This phone is not easy to use and misrepresented! I do not recommend it to anyone EVER! I want my money back including reimbursement for shipping as well as return shipping! It feels like an archaic phone, like old school. It is seriously SLOW!

Reviews.Title: Thank you!!
Reviews.Author: Lexus
Reviews.Content: Arrived in very good condition and i was very satified with my new phone(:I would refer others to use this company.

Reviews.Title: Brilliance
Reviews.Author: nikki horner
Reviews.Content: Simplicity and cheap. I paid $ 59.99 for it with no contract. Looks to be an older version, but still very nice.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad phone.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Brown
Reviews.Content: For what it is this phone is not a bad phone. I didn't care too much about it size because I couldn't text well on it. It worked well and it surf the web well but I didn't care to much about how you had to use the phone online. It was different from my last touchscreen which was a Samsung Infuse. I had a HTC HD7 before that phone so you can see what my issues was. I went from a huge phone to a small one. I think that this phone is good for kids and people with small hands. The price was good and it is well built,I dropped the phone like 20 times and it still work well. I have a different phone now and its a LG.

Reviews.Title: PHONE
Reviews.Author: maxine
Reviews.Content: ONLY PROMBLEM WITH THIS ORDER WAS I COULD NOT SEE THE NAME VERIZON ON THE PHONE HAD TO RETURN WITH NO PROBLEM THANKS MAXINE

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: The phone looked like someone used it and dropped it. It was supposed to be a brand new phone. I returned it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Touchscreen-enabled smartphone with 3.2-inch LCD, intuitive TouchWiz interface, and 8 GB internal memory
3G speeds on EV-DO network; access VZ Navigator for GPS-enabled for turn-by-turn directions; use phone as a modem for your laptop
5-megapixel camera/camcorder; digital audio player; multi-codec video player (WMA, DivX, Xvid); Wi-Fi networking (802.11g/b); Bluetooth stereo music
Up to 4.2 hours of talk time, up to 350 hours (14.6 days) of standby time
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No contract Required. Includes: Phone, Wall Charger, Battery. (Data Plan Required)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Omnia i910 Phone, Silver (Verizon Wireless) Touchscreen Cell Phone
